amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by DOD to increase prices at military commissaries, at home and overseas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of section 2483(b)(5) of title 10, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Hunter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
